import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";/**
 * QuantitySelector component - Reusable input for selecting quantities
 * Used in multiple places like inventory, shop, etc.
 */const QuantitySelector=_ref=>{let{value,onChange,min=1,max=99,step=1,label='Quantity:',name='quantity'}=_ref;const handleChange=e=>{const newValue=parseInt(e.target.value)||min;onChange(Math.min(max,Math.max(min,newValue)));};const increment=()=>{if(value<max){onChange(value+step);}};const decrement=()=>{if(value>min){onChange(value-step);}};const handleBlur=()=>{// Ensure the value stays within bounds on blur
if(value<min)onChange(min);if(value>max)onChange(max);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-selector",children:[label&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:name,children:label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"quantity-btn decrease",onClick:decrement,disabled:value<=min,"aria-label":"Decrease quantity",children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:name,name:name,min:min,max:max,step:step,value:value,onChange:handleChange,onBlur:handleBlur,className:"quantity-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"quantity-btn increase",onClick:increment,disabled:value>=max,"aria-label":"Increase quantity",children:"+"})]}),max!==Infinity&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-presets",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onChange(1),children:"Min"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onChange(Math.floor(max/2)),children:"Half"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onChange(max),children:"Max"})]})]});};export default QuantitySelector;
